rooms.name: A
rooms.description: Hello welcome to the castle. I am your guide for this adventure. I have brought you here to naviagate my maze in the castle to receive treasure, this is simply for my perverse pleasure. Please choose a direction to follow, north for up, south for down, east for left, and west for right. Currently there are doors up and to the right make your choice:
